    Cleanup species function

    cleanup_by_species.Rd

    Filter catch by species, create a vector of tows and give tows a random assignment to be resampled,

    cleanup_by_species(
  catch,
  spp_info,
  seq_from = 0.1,
  seq_to = 1,
  seq_by = 0.1,
  tot_dataframes = 91,
  replicate_num = 10
)

    Arguments

    catch

    full catch df

    spp_info

    A data frame containing information about the test species.

    seq_from

    A numeric value specifying the start of the sequence for data frames.

    seq_to

    A numeric value specifying the end of the sequence for data frames.

    seq_by

    A numeric value specifying the step size of the sequence for data frames.

    tot_dataframes

    the number of data frames you want to output. effort x replicates - (replicates - 1). 5x3-2

    replicate_num

    An integer specifying the number of replicates.

    x

    catch_split data frame

    Join Data Frames

    Function to join a list of data frames to a main data frame using a shared column.

    list_of_dfs

    The list of data frames that you would like to join to the main data frame

    main_df

    The main data frame that you want to join the list of data frames

    shared_column

    The column that all the data frames share which will be used to join the data frames together.

    Value

    List of resampled catch data frames

    Tow Function

    Create a vector of tows for including or excluding.

    Contents

    Developed by Emily Markowitz, Derek Bolser, Elizabeth Perl, Ian Taylor.
